elements.name: reasonYesPanel
elements.title: Even if you don't agree, what reasons might someone give for answering "✅ Yes" to this question?
elements.description: Please enter one reason per line. To add another line, click the "Add new" button below. Please list as many reasons as you can think of.

elements.name: reasonNoPanel
elements.title: Even if you don't agree, what reasons might someone give for answering "❌ No" to this question?
elements.description: Please enter one reason per line. To add another line, click the "Add new" button below. Please list as many reasons as you can think of.
